backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, help requests, lesson categories, lessons, and custom sorting with access control mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature evidence listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing one‑sentence summaries for all major frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps all pages in the AppLayout component.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout with header navigation, footer, and active‑state handling for top‑level routes.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Simple logo component rendering a static image asset.
frontend/src/components/guided-form/form: Defines preset form templates with fields, metadata, and options for job applications, surveys, and registrations.
frontend/src/components/guided-form/Guid: Implements a multi‑step guided form wizard with form selection, field navigation, validation, and review state management.
frontend/src/components/guided-form/type: Declares TypeScript types for form templates, field definitions, form data, and validation results.
frontend/src/components/guided-form/vali: Provides field‑level and full‑form validation logic for required fields, emails, and phone numbers.
Renders the hero section for the Learn page with a title, description, and illustration.
frontend/src/components/learn/LessonList: Displays lessons grouped by category with loading states, expandable category selection, and links to lesson pages.
frontend/src/components/learn/ScamAwaren: Shows a checklist of red and green flags for scam awareness using styled list items.
frontend/src/components/support/HelpRequ: Implements a help request form with validation, submission handling, and a success message state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking. Wraps Dfinity AuthClient with custom options and exposes a hook for consuming identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching lesson categories, lessons, disclaimers, support info, and submitting help requests using an actor backend. Each hook manages enabled states and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes with green/orange accents. Applies global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering. Imports global styles and the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/ContactSupportPage.ts: Displays support contact info, response/privacy notes, a safety reminder card, and a help request form. Uses React Query to load backend support text.
frontend/src/pages/GuidedFormFillingPage: Renders an introduction and explanation of the guided form-filling tool, followed by the guided form wizard component. Emphasizes step‑by‑step form assistance.
frontend/src/pages/LearnPage.tsx: Shows a hero section, disclaimer alert, scam checklist, and a list of lessons grouped by category. Loads categories and disclaimer via React Query with skeletons during loading.
frontend/src/pages/LessonDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed lesson view with tags, difficulty, reading‑time estimate, disclaimer, and full lesson content. Handles loading and not‑found states and includes a scam awareness checklist.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash params, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app purpose, existing features, image requirements, and pending feature requests.
